entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High 24. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
